title: I'm not intent feeding.  Riot nerfed my Fiora main with the rework.
body:
I wish I was as good as I was with the old Fiora. 

I just don't think she's as good of a champ. 

I was the greatest Fiora of all time and I can tell you that you ruined my champ Riot.

I wish I could have it back...

But I just don't think you care.  I don't think you care about the game.

I don't think you communicate with us well in the message boards and I would like to see that change. 

I would like a response from a developer in the public eye instead of just having my post deleted.  You handle the situation by deleting the post instead of talking about possibly changing Fiora here on this thread back like a normal person.

replies.body: I main Fiora after the rework and she's much more balanced and can outplay more now. Plus the mini game is fun. Press R for kills is no fun.
Everyone who likes the new Fiora better deserves to be burned like a witch screaming in torment. Boiling with their own wrenched hate for the old Fiora.

Don't claim to be a Fiora main if you like the new Fiora.  

You are not loyal to Fiora...

You are no Fiora main.

No, you are the one who is not a Fiora main.

Someone who mains a champion sticks with that champion through their high points and lows.  I'm a Garen main, and I've been with him since season 1.  I've seen his high points back in the day, his slump in season 3/4, and have dealt with the Juggernaut update that shifted him from a reliable champion that "falls off" late game if you can't play him well to a mid game champ that doesn't fall off late, but has a difficult early game if you make more than one mistake.  I'm still trying to figure out how to keep on opponents now that his movement speed has been destroyed by nerfs.

But I still play Garen.  I don't like where he is right now, but I still main Garen.  You, on the other hand, are stuck maining the old Fiora that no longer exists.  Fiora changed, and if you can't change with her then it's about time you realize that she isn't your main anymore.
https://media.giphy.com/media/7rj2ZgttvgomY/giphy.gif

You my friend are a true loyal main.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I'm still playing her.  I'm sure I have more games on either one than all of you combined. 
New or old.  I'm just here to tell you they ruined my main and they don't care and will never care about Fiora  like I do.
You've told us a bunch of times. Pretty sure only you care at this point.

It's true... Only I care about Fiora. 

I want that written in stone. 

Riot didn't care...

The other players didn't care! 

But I cared.

Cause that was the only champ that let me 1vs5 when all 4 of my teamates are noobs and dead.

I think about how I will be defending the nexus solo.

Thanks for the nerfed ult Riot...

Thanks for the plecebo

You only care about old Fiora.

That is what you are writing in stone.  You don't care about what she is, or what she could be, only what she was.
What the fuck kind of logic is that.
Troll logic.
Well, that escalated quickly.

> [{quoted}](name=F3ORA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IkJE4z4B,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-11-07T16:24:13.524+0000)
>
> I wish I was as good as I was with the old Fiora. 

Ok, starting with nostalgia as always. 
> 
> I just don&#039;t think she&#039;s as good of a champ. 
> 

Granted she's easier to balance and more unique than female Yi. But hey, that's what opinions are for. 

> I was the greatest Fiora of all time and I can tell you that you ruined my champ Riot.
> 

Back to the usual boasting and still has no evidence beyond your word supporting you. Great, keep it up. 

> I wish I could have it back...
> 

You mean "her". Or is Fiora an "it" to you?  

> But I just don&#039;t think you care.  I don&#039;t think you care about the game. 

If Riot didn't care about the game then I doubt we'd even have an official boards. 


> I don&#039;t think you communicate with us well in the message boards and I would like to see that change. 
> 

An actual request that is only mildly insulting.  Good for you. 


> I would like a response from a developer in the public eye instead of just having my post deleted.  You handle the situation by deleting the post instead of talking about possibly changing Fiora here on this thread back like a normal person.

You see, the thing here is that there is nothing to discuss. At all. Fiora's rework was awhile ago and any possibility of a revert are down the drain at this point because her design is working. 

You say you're not as good with Fiora as you were old Fiora, that's obvious because she's a different champion. Take the time to practice her and I'm sure you'll be sat- actually no. You will never be satisfied because you can't move on. 

If you do get a Riot response, don't expect it to go your way.

Edit: also I have to question the feeding thing since you did well your last game as Fiora but you also built an ER on Singed...in ranked.

If she's a different champion why not give her a new name?
Why destroy my main? 
The only main that works with 1vs5 after your 4 noobs die?

Because life hates you and you specifically. 

/s

Riot hates me.  They nerfed my main and at the same time they ruined Fiora they banned me from ranked. 

I'd say they are Fiora haters at the very least.
You still play ranked. Like that Singed game where you built crit Singed.

Old fiora all you did was press R and got a penta kill, Oh please.
She is sitting at a 49.83% Winrate, thats almost as balanced as you can get.
Get out of here with that talk if you are going to be a total hoodlum.

Get outta here ya bronze 4 trash. Not to mention you don't even have a 1.00 KDA on her.
Probably the last person I will ever want to take notes from on who is nerfed to shit.

You just don't know how to play, how to build a champion right, nothing. so git outta here.
so basically you miss the no skill ult to kill fiora because you lack the skill to learn this one? got it

You guys only say "no skill champ" because you need an explanation for me wiping the floor with you. Something that doesn't hurt your feeling. Whatever floats your boat...  I can smell your butt hurt from here.
Then explain it. Don't just say "1v5 pentakills".

Once there was a troll named F3ORA.

A child with spam plethora.

He whined and complained

About the champ he mained

But never did he adapt to new Fiora.


And that is my poem for this thread.

But in all seriousness, you need to stop this spam because it is getting old.

Hey good one. 

Is that a limerick?
Thank you, yes it is XD.

When you get your main nerfed you sit down.  You bend over. But not me! 
I cry FOUL!   I cry because this Fiora is an imposter. 

I cry for my missing champion. 

Someone kidnapped her. 

Haven't you ever cared about anyone before?

What if they were kidnapped by Riot and the code was changed so you would have to pay millions of dollars to get your main back.  Riot is holding Fiora for Ransom I swear!

My friend Fiora is being held hostage!

Real mains take a look at the changes and say this: How the fuck can I get the most out of these changes? Be it nerfs, buffs, or even reworks.

You on the other hand: http://artsmeme.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/toddlerpic8-300x200.jpg I DON'T WANT TO LEARN AND ADAPT! http://artsmeme.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/toddlerpic8-300x200.jpg

People assume I can't adapt to the new Fiora...

I get 40 and 7 instead of 40 and 0.

The new one is a disgrace.

Oh dear, they added counter play to a strong champ...

So what of you die 7 times instead of 0.

No champ should be able to easily 1v5. That is a broken mechanic and it is good that they don't have any like that.

It should take skills to fight a team...not faceroll a keyboard. This is League of Legends, a TEAM based MOBA. Not some gun ho fps like Call of Duty... You want to 1v5 someone...Go to Dota or Smite and quit trolling the forums about an update that has been out for a while  now.

I'm pretty sure we're just feeding the troll. 

I have nothing better to do cause work. But if you do turn heads up.
I just couldn't resist...
I understand completely.
I could just post both if their accounts op.gg links. Could be fun.
Both?  What's the other?

Here it is: [R3PORTED.](http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=R3PORTED)

[F3ORA](http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=F3ORA)
Wow. That is sad.
I think I find it absolutely hilarious.
Just looked at his history... Ad Sona in ranked????!!!! So it seems he's a troll in game as well as on the boards......
SO FOR THE RECORD I GET HYPER DOWN VOTES BECAUSE I CARE ABOUT FIORA MORE THAN YOU GUYS!
JUST BECAUSE I FIGHT FOR FIORA TO THE BITTER END YOU GUYS GOTTA RAIN ON MY PARADE!
You were supporting the toxic & mindless kit old Fiora has. You're just stubborn in not wanting to change your ways of playing her new kit. Even Fiora would see you as a disgrace.

Especially because Fiora fights with honor and skill.

When you outplay on new Fiora you look good.

With old Fiora you just hit R.
If it's to be a game of skill you have to allow me to 1vs5 and prevail.  If it requires a teamate now to 1vs5 this is no longer a game of skill but a game of chance.

And what if the other team has skill too?

They have to be able to beat you too, especially if there are five of them.

> [{quoted}](name=TyrekGoldenspear,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IkJE4z4B,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2016-11-07T18:48:19.834+0000)
>
> And what if the other team has skill too?
> 
> They have to be able to beat you too, especially if there are five of them.

They always could even with the old Fiora.  Zed for example always caused me trouble with his ult.

They made is so I can't 1vs5 anymore so even if you are good and all 4 of your noob temates are dead you can't win anymore. They are gonna die. They are all 4 noobs. What's the point in playing if you can't 1vs5 after they are all dead?

> They made is so I can't 1vs5 anymore

Troll is very obvious
